title: Stags’ Leap Winery Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, November 5, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an evening celebrating the timeless elegance and craftsmanship of Stags’ Leap Winery, one of Napa Valley’s most historic and distinguished estates. Experience a flight that showcases the power, grace, and depth that define this legendary producer.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Stags’ Leap The Investor Red Wine 2020 – A lush Bordeaux-style blend bursting with ripe red and black berries, mocha, vanilla, and warm spice, balanced by freshness and refined tannins.

• Stags’ Leap Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 93 pts James Suckling – Elegant and layered with red currant, blackberry, sweet oak, and floral undertones, finishing silky and complex.

• Stags’ Leap Petite Sirah 2021 – 92 pts Wine Enthusiast – Bold yet graceful, showing blackberry pie, lavender, thyme, and cocoa with a vibrant, lingering finish.

• Stags’ Leap Viognier 2022 – Fragrant and lively with notes of mandarin, peach, jasmine, and honey, finishing dry and sophisticated with a touch of spice.

Taste the legacy of Napa Valley’s Stags’ Leap Winery—a perfect balance of heritage, artistry, and modern finesse.
